abstracts.cdata!:
The project will contain the following
            components: (i) Farm Development: provision to Project
            farmers of extension services, seeds, fertilizers, farm
            implements, livestock, and other inputs as credit in kind;
            (ii) Establishment of Village Cooperatives: provision of
            technical assistance, training and administrative support
            for the establishment of 20 village cooperatives, plus for
            each village, a cooperative office and store, water supply,
            a grain milling center, about 6 km of village roads; (iii)
            Establishment of a Cooperative Union: technical assistance
            and training for the establishment of a cooperative union
            and the provision of a livestock market, a facility for
            cleaning, storing and handling grain, an office, warehouses,
            a workshop, and communal grazing areas; (iv) Establishment
            of a Cooperative Cattle Ranch; (v) Road Construction; (vi)
            Basic Health and Education Facilities; (vii) Project
            Administration and Support; and (viii) Research, Studies,
            Project Preparation.
